text: Ignacio Martín Fernández (; born 12 January 1990) is an Argentine professional footballer. He plays as a midfielder, currently for River Plate in the Argentinean League. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center" |+ Club statistics |- !rowspan="2"|Club
